de.polygonal.core.math.Limits

type
class

Limits for integer and float types.

Static Variables

DOUBLE_MAX(inline,null) : Float

The largest representable number (double-precision IEEE-754).

DOUBLE_MIN(inline,null) : Float

The smallest representable number (double-precision IEEE-754).

FLOAT_MAX(inline,null) : Float

The largest representable number (single-precision IEEE-754).

FLOAT_MIN(inline,null) : Float

The smallest representable number (single-precision IEEE-754).

INT16_MAX(inline,null) : Int

Max value, signed short.

INT16_MIN(inline,null) : Int

Min value, signed short.

INT32_MAX(inline,null) : Int

Max value, signed integer.
Equals 0x3fffffff when targeting neko, otherwise 0x7fffffff.

INT32_MIN(inline,null) : Int

Min value, signed integer.
Equals 0xc0000000 when targeting neko, otherwise 0x80000000.

INT8_MAX(inline,null) : Int

Max value, signed byte.

INT8_MIN(inline,null) : Int

Min value, signed byte.

INT_BITS(inline,null) : Int

Number of bits using for representing integers.
Equals 31 when targeting neko, otherwise 32.

UINT16_MAX(inline,null) : Int

Max value, unsigned short.

UINT32_MAX(inline,null) : Int

Max value, unsigned integer.
Equals 0x7fffffff when targeting neko, otherwise 0x3fffffff.

UINT8_MAX(inline,null) : Int

Max value, unsigned byte.
